competition

Class Competition

  • java.lang.Object
    • competition.Competition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Progress

    public class Competition
extends java.lang.Object
implements Progress
    Allows different types of competitions between two Connect-Four-Agents implementing the interface Agent.
    Author:
    Markus Thill

    • Constructor Detail

      • Competition

        public Competition(Agent X,
           Agent O,
           AlphaBetaAgent referee)
        Parameters:
        X - First Agent
        O - Second Agent
        referee - A perfect playing AB-Agent. If this parameter is null, then the referee is initialized in the constructor

    • Method Detail

      • setInitialBoard

        public void setInitialBoard(int[][] board)
        Set the initial board for the next competition. If not changed, this board will be used for all competitions.
        Parameters:
        board -

      • multiCompete

        public ResultCompMulti multiCompete(int compNum,
                           boolean swapPlayers,
                           boolean getValues)
        Multi-Competition from the same initial-board
        Parameters:
        compNum - Number of Competitions
        swapPlayers - swap players after each competition. Each agent will start the game for one board once. The number of competitions will double in this case
        getValues - choose, if the values of the agents and the referee shall be logged for each move made. Makes a competition take longer.
        Returns:
        Object containing an Overview and every single game.

      • multiCompete

        public ResultCompMulti multiCompete(int compNum,
                           int pieceNum,
                           boolean swapPlayers,
                           boolean getValues)
        Parameters:
        compNum - Number of Competitions
        pieceNum - Stop game after pieceNum pieces are on the board an get the result by the referee.
        swapPlayers - swap players after each competition. Each agent will start the game for one board once. The number of competitions will double in this case
        getValues - choose, if the values of the agents and the referee shall be logged for each move made. Makes a competition take longer.
        Returns:
        an Object containing an Overview and every single game.

      • multiCompete

        public ResultCompMulti multiCompete(int[][][] boards,
                           boolean swapPlayers,
                           boolean getValues)
        Parameters:
        boards - boards for every single competition.
        swapPlayers - swap players after each competition. Each agent will start the game for one board once. The number of competitions will double in this case
        getValues - choose, if the values of the agents and the referee shall be logged for each move made. Makes a competition take longer.
        Returns:
        an Object containing an Overview and every single game.

      • multiCompete

        public ResultCompMulti multiCompete(int pieceNum,
                           int[][][] boards,
                           boolean swapPlayers,
                           boolean getValues)
        Parameters:
        pieceNum - Stop game after pieceNum pieces are on the board an get the result by the referee.
        boards - boards for every single competition.
        swapPlayers - swap players after each competition. Each agent will start the game for one board once. The number of competitions will double in this case
        getValues - choose, if the values of the agents and the referee shall be logged for each move made. Makes a competition take longer.
        Returns:
        an Object containing an Overview and every single game.

      • compete

        public ResultCompSingle compete(boolean getValues,
                       boolean stopByABWinEvaluation)
        Play single Game with starting Position in c4
        Parameters:
        getValues - choose, if the values of the agents and the referee shall be logged for each move made. Makes a competition take longer.
        Returns:
        an Object containing the results of this single match.

      • compete

        public ResultCompSingle compete(int pieceNum,
                       boolean getValues,
                       boolean stopByABWinEvaluation)
        Like compete. But stop game, if pieceNum pieces are placed on the board
        Parameters:
        pieceNum - Stop game after pieceNum pieces are on the board an get the result by the referee.
        getValues - choose, if the values of the agents and the referee shall be logged for each move made. Makes a competition take longer.
        Returns:
        an Object containing the results of this single match.
